#summary Hapax2 API
#labels Documentation,Featured

 <wiki:toc/>

 = Files =

 Files are named with "xtm" filename extension. 

 = Sections =

 CTemplate sections are repeated once for each child dictionary found
 in their name.

 = API Example =

 This example is clipped from http://code.google.com/p/teamfrednet-gap/source/browse/trunk/src/gap/odl/Main.java

{{{

import hapax.Template;
import hapax.TemplateCache;
import hapax.TemplateDictionary;
import hapax.TemplateException;

    public final static void Process(File xtm, File odl, PrintWriter out)
        throws IOException, TemplateException, Syntax
    {
        TemplateCache loader = new TemplateCache(xtm.getParent());
        Template template = loader.getTemplate(xtm.getPath());
        TemplateDictionary dict = new TemplateDictionary();
        Reader odlReader = new Reader(odl);
        Class odlClass = new Class(odlReader);
        dict.put("package_name",odlClass.pack.name);
        dict.put("class_name",odlClass.name);
        if (odlClass.hasImports()){
            TemplateDictionary imports = dict.addChildDict("import");
            for (Import imp : odlClass.imports){
                if (imp.isPackage())
                    imports.put("import_package",imp.packageName);
                else
                    imports.put("import_class",imp.className);
            }
        }
        else
            dict.hideSection("import");
        if (odlClass.hasFields()){
            TemplateDictionary fields = dict.addChildDict("field");
            for (Field field : odlClass.fields){
                fields.put("field_class",field.typeName);
                fields.put("field_name",field.name);
            }
        }
        else
            dict.hideSection("field");
    }

}}}
